DocAttribute.Name: HatchLineAppearance
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve style of the hatching lines. Any curve style pattern shall start at the origin of each hatch line.

DocAttribute.Name: StartOfNextHatchLine
PointOfReferenceHatchLine
DocAttribute.Documentation:
A Cartesian point which defines the offset of the reference hatch line from the origin of the (virtual) hatching coordinate system. The origin is used for mapping the fill area style hatching onto an annotation fill area or surface. The reference hatch line would then appear with this offset from the fill style target point. If not given the reference hatch lines goes through the origin of the (virtual) hatching coordinate system.
{ .change-ifc2x3} > IFC2x3 CHANGE  The usage of the attribute _PointOfReferenceHatchLine_ has changed to not provide the Cartesian point which is the origin for mapping, but to provide an offset to the origin for the mapping. The attribute has been made OPTIONAL.

DocAttribute.Name: PatternStart
DocAttribute.Documentation:
A distance along the reference hatch line which is the start point for the curve style font pattern of the reference hatch line. If not given, the start point of the curve style font pattern is at the (virtual) hatching coordinate system.
{ .change-ifc2x2} > IFC2x2 Add2 CHANGE The attribute _PatternStart_ has been made OPTIONAL.

DocAttribute.Name: HatchLineAngle
DocAttribute.Documentation: A plane angle measure determining the direction of the parallel hatching lines.

DocWhereRule.Name: PatternStart2D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcCartesianPoint_, if given as value to _PatternStart_ shall have the dimensionality of 2.

DocWhereRule.Name: RefHatchLine2D
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcCartesianPoint_, if given as value to _PointOfReferenceHatchLine_ shall have the dimensionality of 2.
